title: MBUZZ Esports
description: MBUZZ Esports is brand new branch from MBUZZ. In a matter of a few days we managed to deliver a structured application with a playful design. We're proud of this collaboration which brought our website to the Gitex 2022.

title: Saudi Excellence Co.
description: SaudiExcellenceCo's website is the proof that quality can be reached even with a short deadline. They came with a challenge: 10 days to create a unique website to showcase at the AI Summit in Duba√Ø. It took 8 days from the design to the creation and release.

title: A.C. Ventures
description: Their goal was to have a simple yet elegant identity that showcases their portfolio without overshadowing their business. For them, we designed a logo, a mockup and created a website that displays the values of their company and their stories. Here, the robustness of A.C. Ventures is represented by a thick and modern font with no frills.
